sn53.1-12:1: At S훮vatth카. There the Blessed One said this:
sn53.1-12:2: "Bhikkhus, just as the river Ganges slants, slopes, and inclines towards the east, so too a bhikkhusn.v.308who develops and cultivates the four jh훮nas slants, slopes, and inclines towards Nibb훮na.
sn53.1-12:3: Six about slanting to the eastAnd six about slanting to the ocean.These two sixes make up twelve:Thus the subchapter is recited.
